title: Martian Drone
summaries: The Martian Drone is a Hardmode, post-Golem flying enemy that spawns during the Martian Madness event. It can move through solid blocks. When it is positioned lower than the player, it will directly fly towards a point just above the player. After reaching the point, or the player is positioned lower than the Martian Drone, it will dive down towards the player. Once it gets close enough to the player, it self-destructs, dealing area-of-effect damage.

statistics.Damage: 60/120/180
statistics.Max Life: 300/600/900
statistics.KB Resist: 60%/64%/68%
statistics.Banner: [img:Martian Drone Banner]Martian Drone Banner(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions)
